description:
Most items can be purchased as Crafted or Blueprint.
All items are ascendant.
Type `.rshop` to open the RCON shop.
Type `.rshoplist` to view just prices.

footer.text: Type 'Donate' to become a Tier Supporter and get higher Payday rewards!
